title: 081 - Let's Play Ball It's Gameday
description: On today's show, the boys celebrate the return of the NFL season and get right into a packed Pod FOD including what some of their favorite arcade games at Dave & Buster's/Charles Entertainment Cheese are, Bill does his best to derail the show in any way possible, they discuss Nic Cage deciding where the limit is in his acting, the Gumpy and Mitt rivalry continues to develop, and Nick comes back with a few new Friday Bangerz to help send you into the weekend. Don't forget to subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow for all PMI content, and send in your questions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all for listening, have an incredible weekend. Enjoy.
